title: Searge：命令方块的更新将在明天快照中出现
author: ufof
txt_content:
本帖最后由 ufof 于 2015-8-18 15:36 编辑 
Ok, the branch with the command block changes I made was merged into our 1.9 branch today, so they will definitely be in tomorrows snapshot.


Searge：Ok，命令方块的更新属于今天的1.9部分更新，所以绝对会在明天的快照中出现。

replies.author: kuangwenxin
replies.txt_content:
